articles.description: Live text updates as Republic of Ireland face Albania followed by Northern Ireland against Hungary in the Women's Nations League qualifiers, live on BBC iPlayer and BBC Sport website.

articles.description: Wales produce a vastly-improved performance in Viborg but still suffer a 2-1 defeat away to Denmark in Nations League Group A3.
articles.title: Wales beaten despite improved display in Denmark

articles.description: An indoor "high-tech golf league" - launched by Tiger Woods and Rory McIlroy and backed by Stephen Curry and the Williams sisters - starts on 9 January.

articles.description: Hosting a men's World Cup has long been an ambition for Saudi Arabia writes BBC sports editor Dan Roan, but questions and intense scrutiny will remain.
articles.title: Why Saudi 2034 World Cup should not surprise anyone

articles.description: Fakhar Zaman scores a rapid 81 as Pakistan race to a seven-wicket win over Bangladesh in Kolkata.
articles.title: Pakistan race to victory to eliminate Bangladesh

articles.description: Jonny May, England's second highest try scorer of all time, says "words can't describe the journey that I've been on".
articles.title: England wing May retires from international rugby
